---
title: "🗓️ Week 01 - Introduction"

This session will introduce you to the concept of applied quantitative research in general, give a brief outline of the course, and address organizational issues. We will then have a short followup to themes discussed during the presessional.

## 📚 Recommended Reading

- Chapters 1 & 2 from [The Effect book](https://theeffectbook.net/the-design-of-research.html)

- Interesting reading: [The Credibility Revolution in Empirical Economics: How Better Research Design Is Taking the Con out of Econometrics](https://www.aeaweb.org/articles?id=10.1257/jep.24.2.3)
